short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mini-Viewer for the Dan Benjamin Hour

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Love watching live recordings of the Dan Benjamin Hour and hanging out in the chat room, but don't want it to use up all your valuable screen space with a full browser window? This handy app will let you enjoy the show and conversation in a more compact way, allowing you to do Real Work while still keeping tabs on the show.
